summary:
Highly motivated, hardworking and enthusiastic qualified Chartered International Tax Advisor with the ITI (Ireland) and Chambre des Salaries (Luxembourg). Diversified skill sets covering international restructuring, tax compliance, acquisition structuring, industry research, financial analysis and tax accounting. Excellent inter-personal and digital communication skills.

Strong experience in international corporate taxation with a focus on international tax and legal structuring, treaty developments, transfer pricing and EU direct taxation developments.

awards.title: Chartered Tax Adviser (CTA)
awards.description:
The Chartered Tax Adviser (CTA) qualification is Ireland’s leading taxation qualification and is held
by the majority of Ireland’s most experienced tax advisers.

awards.title: LL.M in International and European Tax Law
awards.description: LL.M in International and European Tax Law with cum laude.

awards.title: Master in Polish Law
awards.description: Master in Polish Law with cum laude.

organizations.name: Irish Chamber of Commerce in Central and Eastern Europe

publications.name: Introduction to the Polish taxation system

profile_positions.description:
-  Leading APM Terminals tax affairs
- Global M&A
- Pillar II impact assessment
- DAC6 reporting 
- Grants and Incentives
profile_positions.title: Senior Corporate Tax Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Managing/leading the international tax (direct and indirect) and structuring (holding, funding and operating - Development costs, EPC, OM and AM, structures) work for the existing and new investments in Asia, Middle East, LATAM and Europe.     
- Advising on optimal funding instruments of project companies and operating companies. 
- Reviewing new business initiatives and scope the potential impact on existing tax processes and projects.
- Advising on tax related matters and funding of operating entities in/via the Netherlands.
- Reviewing contracts and provide tax comments in drafting contracts that are in line with structuring decisions.
-Research and document direct/indirect tax issues, including coordination with external advisors and be able to present findings orally and in writing to tax and non-tax stakeholders.
- Transfer pricing – assist in developing, document and execute policy for the Group. Ensure compliance on TP. 
- Monitoring and ensuring general global compliance within the tax area.
- Managing relationship with tax authorities.
- Monitoring tax legislation and assess measures impacting group's operations.
- Providing technical support/advice and assistance to subsidiaries when required and upon ad-hoc requests.
- Developing a broad network with a variety of stakeholders across the Group's business and representing tax in cross functional collaborations.
- Working in cross functional teams and to explain tax technical matters in language that non tax people can understand.
profile_positions.title: International Senior Tax Manager
Manager International Tax
Tax Assistant Manager
Tax Assistant Manager
Senior Tax

profile_positions.description:
Tax consultant: 
- Business start-up
- Tax efficient profit repatriation from companies
- Family business succession
- Purchase and sale of business
- Tax-efficient funding of business under EIIS regime
- Corporate reorganizations
- Holding company structures
- Tax refund for R&D
- International tax planning
- Estate planning
- Family trusts
profile_positions.title: Tax Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Senior tax consultant in International Tax Department:
- Handled income tax inquiries
- Prepared tax planning (e.g. tax residency, profit distribution, recognition of domestic/foreign permanent establishment, holding/financing activities, merger, liquidation) and tax estimates to optimize tax structure after identifying existing and potential tax issues (e.g. tax loss utilization, application of foreign/domestic tax credits, application of IP tax regime)
- Dealing with tax authorities, clients' queries and internal coordination
- Advisory services in relation to transfer pricing, computation of the margin to be realized, preparation of the related advance pricing agreement
- Conducted industry research and financial analysis
- Assisting in due diligence 
- Coordinated with clients to obtain necessary commercial and financial data
- Prepared, analyzed, and reviewed financial statements using GAAP guidelines
- Prepared reports, graphs, and projects to assist managers/partners in sales campaigns
profile_positions.title: Senior Tax Consultant

volunteer_experiences.description:
